message.content:
To extract the required values from the given income statement, we need to identify the relevant line items for each of the specified categories:

1. **Total Income arising from the entityâ€™s ordinary activities**: This can be identified as "Total Revenue" in the income statement.
2. **Carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period**: This is provided by the "Cost of Goods Sold" line item.
3. **Costs of general management and administration of the entity as a whole**: This corresponds to the "Administrative Expenses" line item.

Now, looking at the provided income statement:

| Account                     | Amount      | Date       |
|----------------------------|-------------|------------|
| Main Business Revenue       | 5991764.34  | 2024-01-29 |
| Total Revenue               | 5991764.34  | 2024-01-29 |
| Cost of Goods Sold          | 3250000.00  | 2024-01-29 |
| Total Cost                  | 3250000.00  | 2024-01-29 |
| Gross Profit                | 2741764.34  | 2024-01-29 |
| Administrative Expenses      | 269591.31   | 2024-01-29 |
| Selling Expenses            | 782775.93   | 2024-01-29 |
| Depreciation                | 45757.71    | 2024-01-29 |
| Financial Expenses          | 190559.73   | 2024-01-29 |
| Total Expenses               | 1288684.68  | 2024-01-29 |
| Interest Income              | 10051.66    | 2024-01-29 |
| Profit Before Tax           | 1463131.32  | 2024-01-29 |
| Tax Expense                 | 299588.25   | 2024-01-29 |
| Net Profit                  | 1163543.07  | 2024-01-29 |

From this income statement:
- The total income (Total Revenue) is **5991764.34**.
- The carrying amount of inventories sold (Cost of Goods Sold) is **3250000.00**.
- The costs of general management and administration (Administrative Expenses) is **269591.31**.
